Directions: In a large bowl, combine the broccoli, corn and egg. Transfer to a greased 1-qt. baking dish. Sprinkle with stuffing mix and drizzle with butter. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 30-35 minutes or until golden brown and bubbly.
Ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
